articles.content: Were now in a very good place in Australia in our fight against COVID-19. When we wrote this, we had very few active cases and no community transmission. Plus, its summer, and a vaccine doesnt appear… [+4878 chars]

articles.author: Harley Dennett
articles.title: Coronavirus vaccine rollout in January will help Australians doing it tough: Labor - Mandurah Mail
articles.description: March vaccine rollout is poor planning, not medical: Albanese
articles.content:
The government's COVID-19 vaccine timeline isn't serving the needs of Australians in isolation, Labor Leader Anthony Albanese says.
